Text:
Wrong place for this I know but if I put it in the right place It'll get removed along with the fake torrent.
Could you tell me what the point is of all those obviously fake torrents that blight this site every morning. What do they hope to achieve??? 

As you can tell I am a noob but even I am not dumb enough to fall for the bullshit seeders/leechers and the fact that the same  uploader just happens to have DVD quality versions of the 10 most popular films of the moment. Please help I'm confused!!!
